title: New Version Bug for OS X
body: I think there is a bug in the new version for os x system. When I connected to the game, the screen would be dislocation and I couldn't enter into the game.

replies.body: Could you shoot me a screenshot so I can really see what's happening on your end? I have a feeling you might be experiencing the same issue we detailed in our [**sticky here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/nxyEq9WA-532017-14-screen-directx-error-issues), but if that doesn't seem to be the same issue I'm more than happy to help troubleshoot with that picture!
